notes: Memory exports stored in nested date folders under this directory.
Exports must replay the active session transcript from turn one; gaps trigger a recovery report before writing.
Session exports read only LLM and user messages that occurred in the active conversation.
Shared memory or unrelated session archives cannot be merged during export.
If any transcript window is missing, summarize what can be recovered before proceeding.
Export-time extension must be reproducible across runs and machines.
Use a fixed seed and stable decoding params to achieve deterministic +5–7% extension.
must_hold: Identical input bytes → identical output bytes for the same model+version.
No parameter auto-tuning at export time unless explicitly requested.
